mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_store (store_name, store_code, location, contact, manager_name, created_at) VALUES (#{storeName}, #{storeCode}, #{location}, #{contact}, #{managerName}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_store SET store_name = #{storeName}, store_code = #{storeCode}, location = #{location}, contact = #{contact}, manager_name = #{managerName}art WHERE store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(store_code, LENGTH(#{regionCode}) + 1) AS UNSIGNED)) FROM tbl_store WHERE store_code LIKE CONCAT(#{regionCode}, '%')
SELECT * FROM tbl_store WHERE store_code LIKE CONCAT(#{regionCode}, '%')
SELECT * FROM tbl_store WHERE store_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storeName}, '%')
